data.title: Toy Train to Shimla
data.meta_description: Our "Indian Summer" tour is suitable for people who have a desire to visit Shimla the summer retreat of the British rulers of India on the toy train from KalKa.
data.text:
DAY 01 DELHI – KALKA – SHIMLA

After breakfast you will be transferred to New Delhi railway station to board train for Kalka.

Delhi – Kalka Kalka Shatabdi Express – 07:40/11:45 hrs

Kalka – Shimla Himalayan Queen – 12:10 /17:20 hrs

From Kalka you will connect with the narrow gauge Toy Train to Barog followed by a private car transfer to Shimla.

Upon arrival in Shimla, transfer to hotel. Stay overnight at Shimla.

Shimla: The capital of Himachal state and was the summer capital of British India during raj times, named after deity Shamla Devi (another name of Goddess Kali) and the setting for the channel 4 drama series “Indian Summer” The city still retains much of its colonial heritage in a variety of architecture, such as Viceregal Lodge, Command House, Gaiety Theatre, Town Hall, and Christ Church on The Ridge. For more information on Shimla and the railway visit our Shimla page.

DAY 02 SHIMLA

After breakfast we will start the heritage walk of Shimla by walking through the town’s Architectural Heritage Zone that brings you close to various architectural sites of the British era. Most of the buildings are still in use. Christ Church, The Ridge, Bandstand, Gaiety Theatre, Scandal Point, Railway Board Building, Gortan Castle, Museum (Museum is closed on Monday and on all government holidays), Viceregal Lodge.

Stay overnight at Shimla. (B)

DAY 03 (Option 2) SHIMLA – KUFRI – NALDEHRA – SHIMLA

After breakfast proceed for an excursion to Kufri & Naldehra.

Kufri, a winter ski resort and during summer, there are pony and horse riding. Also visit the unique Himalayan Zoo.

Stay overnight at Shimla. (B)

DAY 03 (Option 1) / DAY 04 (Option 2) SHIMLA – KALKA – DELHI

After a leisurely breakfast, drive to Kalka railway station to board your train for Delhi .

Train departs Kalka at 17:45hrs and arrives Delhi at 21:55hrs.

Upon you arrival you will be transferred to your hotel.
